arts.ttl: Nkunku adds to AC Milan injury problems against Fiorentina
arts.sum: Injury problems are increasing for Max Allegri, because AC Milan will also be without Christopher...

arts.ttl: Official: Marinelli to officiate Milan vs. Fiorentina – no defeats in seven games
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller Livio Marinelli has been named as the head referee for AC Milan’s clash against Fiorentina tomorrow. Looking at his record with the Rossoneri, the fans can breathe a sigh of relief. After the draw against Juventus, Milan will be looking to bounce back with a win against Fiorentina at San Siro. With multiple stars missing, […] The post Official: Marinelli to officiate Milan vs. Fiorentina – no defeats in seven games appeared first on SempreMilan.

arts.ttl: MP: Milan forward Nkunku unavailable vs Fiorentina – The latest
arts.sum: Massimiliano Allegri is counting the unavailable players for the match against Fiorentina. Among them will most likely be Christopher Nkunku, despite the door left open by the coach in the press conference. Estupiñán and Nkunku out: expected back against Pisa.. Both the Frenchman and Pervis Estupiñán will miss the game against Fiorentina but should return […]

arts.ttl: Allegri warns Milan cannot underestimate Fiorentina: “They deserve more”
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller AC Milan will be up against Fiorentina tomorrow and during his press conference earlier today, Max Allegri warned they cannot afford to underestimate La Viola despite the poor start. Fiorentina’s start to the season has been dire, to say the least, with zero wins and just three points collected so far. Stefano Pioli is certainly […] The post Allegri warns Milan cannot underestimate Fiorentina: “They deserve more” appeared first on SempreMilan.

arts.ttl: Allegri confirms three Milan players out vs. Fiorentina, one in dobut, Saelemaekers back
arts.sum: Massimiliano Allegri confirms that Christian Pulisic, Pervis Estupinan and Adrien Rabiot will miss tomorrow’s game...

arts.ttl: Terim says Milan ‘must always aim to win’ while Fiorentina will bounce back ‘soon’
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller Ahead of the game between AC Milan and Fiorentina, Fatih Terim spoke to Gazzetta dello Sport, having coached both clubs in the past. The well-known Turkish manager coached Fiorentina during the 2000-01 season, but was let go before it came to an end. Then, for the 2001-02 season, he was appointed as the new head […] The post Terim says Milan ‘must always aim to win’ while Fiorentina will bounce back ‘soon’ appeared first on SempreMilan.

arts.ttl: Allegri says injuries are ‘extra motivation’ for Milan-Fiorentina: “An important month”
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller Massimiliano Allegri spoke to the media at his usual press conference on the eve of AC Milan’s clash against Fiorentina. Allegri will be without quite a few key players tomorrow, including Christian Pulisic and Adrien Rabiot, after what was an unfortunate international break for the Rossoneri. It should, by all accounts, result in four changes […] The post Allegri says injuries are ‘extra motivation’ for Milan-Fiorentina: “An important month” appeared first on SempreMilan.

arts.ttl: GdS: Milan’s predicted XI for Fiorentina clash – Allegri eyes four changes
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller Massimiliano Allegri is expected to make quite a few changes to the starting eleven for AC Milan’s game against Fiorentina, as highlighted by a report. So far this season, Allegri hasn’t exactly made loads of changes to the XI between the league games, relying on more or less the same players if possible. For the […] The post GdS: Milan’s predicted XI for Fiorentina clash – Allegri eyes four changes appeared first on SempreMilan.

arts.ttl: GdS: Leao rediscovers key role as Allegri must field new attack against Fiorentina
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller As a result of multiple key injuries, AC Milan will resume their league campaign against Fiorentina with Rafael Leao at the core of everything. Today’s edition of Gazzetta dello Sport (see photo below) has taken a closer look at Milan’s starting eleven for the clash tomorrow. Considering that the likes of Adrien Rabiot and above […] The post GdS: Leao rediscovers key role as Allegri must field new attack against Fiorentina appeared first on SempreMilan.

Tomorrow’s match will not be like any other, neither for Milan fans nor for Stefano Pioli, who after his brief spell in Saudi Arabia with Al-Nassr will return to a San Siro once again colored red and black, but this time as an opponent, as Fiorentina’s coach.
